data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Button,
        click_inside,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let clicked = false;
</script>

<Box
    palette={clicked ? "affirmative" : "negative"}
    padding="small"
    actions={[
        [
            click_inside,
            {
                ignore: "button",
                on_click_inside: () =>
                    (clicked = true),
            },
        ],
    ]}
>
    {clicked
        ? "I was clicked inside!"
        : "I am currently not clicked..."}
    <Button>This will not trigger the action!</Button>
</Box>
data.title: click_inside Ignore
